title: I didn't get given any quests with the new update?
body: My girlfriend got given quests and unlocked some awesome legacy skins etc with the new update this morning, but I on the other hand did not. I was given 1 quest which is a daily, and no other rewards, did you guys get the rewards or am I the only one who missed out?

replies.body:
Hey DayDreamingFairy

Not everyone gets all pre-season missions, as thhey were specific to each player.   

* For players who had played a high number of hours (eg. "Conqueror/Champion/Defender of the League" missions, reward: special emote)
* Players who had purchased Runes using IP ("Rune Collector", reward: Blue Essence) 
* Players who purchased Rune Pages using RP ("Rune Archivist", reward: Epic Skins)

Hope that helps answer your question!

Cheers
Mindstar

Um i purchased runes using ip before pre-season and before the new runes and also before the old runes were in a discount but i didnt get the Rune Collector quest
Any idea why?
i think the cutoff date was earlier this year
